our_mission.title: Our mission
our_mission.text: Fructo is a company that wants to bring back the original objective of technology - to bring information at our fingertips. Our objective is to bring useful information at a glance.
how_are_we_doing_it.title: How are we doing it?
how_are_we_doing_it.text: We believe in the future of web technology and web apps and the possibilities it brings. That's why we are working hard to bring you useful tech using the future of web.

team.title: Our team
